vote.title: Authorize the (1) deposit of the amount awarded by the Special Commissioners in the condemnation proceedings styled City of Dallas v. 1401 Turtle Creek Dunhill, LLC, et al., Cause No. CC-20-05284-E, pending in Dallas County Court at Law No. 3, to acquire approximately 2,706 square feet of land in Dallas County for the Lower Eastbank Interceptor Project; and (2) settlement of the condemnation proceeding for an amount not to exceed the award - Not to exceed $64,054.00, increased from $114,000.00 ($110,946.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,054.00) to $178,054.00 ($175,000.00 being the award, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,054.00) - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize the (1) deposit of the amount awarded by the Special Commissioners in the condemnation proceedings styled City of Dallas v. 1401 Turtle Creek Dunhill, LLC, et al., Cause No. CC-20-05284-E, pending in Dallas County Court at Law No. 3, to acquire approximately 2,706 square feet of land in Dallas County for the Lower Eastbank Interceptor Project; and (2) settlement of the condemnation proceeding for an amount not to exceed the award - Not to exceed $64,054.00, increased from $114,000.00 ($110,946.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,054.00) to $178,054.00 ($175,000.00 being the award, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,054.00) - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund
